amendment.description: Page 8, line 23, after the dollar amount insert the following: "(reduced by $60,000,000)". Page 14, line 13, after the dollar amount insert the following: "(increased by $30,000,000)". Page 15, line 8, after the dollar amount insert the following: "(increased by $30,000,000".
